name: Viewing news about a particular share
methodName: Viewing news about a particular share

testSteps.description: Given Tim is interested in Apple
When Tim views the news about AAPL

children.description: Tim executes a GET on the resource /api/stock/{stockid}/news

restQuery.responseHeaders:

testSteps.description: Then Tim should only see articles related to AAPL

userStory.narrative:
In order to make sensible trading decisions
  As a trader
  I want to be informed of relevant news about shares I am interested in

title: Viewing news about a particular share
